tweet_text:
@TrinityPurl Yikes 😬
I'm aware of the effects of meth & agree that that guy's behavior was typical of a raging meth-head.

So what I meant was that meth isn't a drug that's "socially acceptable" when referencing someone's behavior on TV.

It's not a drug to joke about.
